scripts.prerelease: sh -c 'if [ -f .changeset/pre.json ]; then pnpm changeset version && pnpm -r build && pnpm changeset publish && pnpm changeset pre exit; else pnpm changeset pre enter beta && pnpm changeset version && pnpm -r build && pnpm changeset publish && pnpm changeset pre exit; fi'
scripts.release: pnpm changeset && pnpm changeset version && pnpm -r build && pnpm changeset publish
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules && rimraf dist && pnpm -r clean
